title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Baker's Fatal Flaw, Marcus Thompson on Warriors Resurgence, KD/Steph Breakup, NBA’s Greatest Dynasties
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Baker's Fatal Flaw, Marcus Thompson on Warriors Resurgence, KD/Steph Breakup, NBA’s Greatest Dynasties
description:
Colin explains why the Giants’ offensive mess reminds of a restaurant in El Paso (3:00), and why Baker Mayfield is falling into Jay Cutler territory (8:00). The Athletic Bay Area columnist Marcus Thompson, and Colin discuss how the Warriors made Marcus feeling like “the idiot” (11:00), what he’s seen from Klay Thompson in his recovery (13:00), how Andrew Wiggins finally found a fit (21:00), if the Lakers are still a threat to win the West (26:00), the fallout from the Steph/KD breakup (28:00), the first great dynasty in NBA history (32:00), the underrated dynasty that permanently changed the game (33:00), and the greatest basketball franchise nobody talks about (38:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
